page.title: 15BENENDEN WEALD, FERTILISERS
page.content: Forest Farm is mainly second grade land with some third grade, it therefore needs much fertiliser.They have always had a manure spreader but the spreader is now automatic.In the winter they use a compound fertiliser as well. Soil samples are taken frequently by the Ministry of Agriculture.One fertiliser they use is 24 units of potash and 24 units of phosphorus. Scrapers are used to clear the cow sheds, these work every four hours day and night.The scrapers are a very efficient and effective way of cleaning the sheds. The manure goes to a large slurry pit and the slurry is put on the stubble in the fields after harvest.The farm shows the use of natural as well as artificial fertilisers.
